and display = '1' and station_id=#{stationId}

select DATE_ADD(CONCAT(DATE(#{startTime}),' ',(HOUR(#{startTime}) div 4)*4,':00:00'),INTERVAL ${index} HOUR) startDate, DATE_ADD(CONCAT(DATE(#{startTime}),' ',(HOUR(#{startTime}) div 4)*4,':00:00'),INTERVAL ${last} HOUR) endDate

select mcu,${paramColumn},DATE_FORMAT(time,'${format}') dateFormatStr ,${dataType} dataType from wt_data_raw where mcu = #{mcu} and time BETWEEN #{searchDate} AND DATE_SUB(DATE_ADD(#{searchDate},INTERVAL ${subIndex} ${subUnit}),INTERVAL 1 SECOND) GROUP BY dateFormatStr ORDER BY time DESC

select mcu,${paramColumn},${dataType} dataType from wt_data_raw where mcu = #{mcu} and time BETWEEN DATE_FORMAT(#{searchDate},'${format}') and DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(#{searchDate},INTERVAL ${subIndex} ${subUnit}),'${format}') GROUP BY mcu

SELECT CASE p.display WHEN '1' THEN CASE p.${poColumn} WHEN '1' THEN IFNULL(l. LEVEL, '-') ELSE '-' END ELSE NULL END FROM ${table} p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM wt_water_level WHERE param = #{tarParam} AND (has_upper=1 or has_lower=1) AND CASE WHEN has_lower = '1' && has_upper = '0' THEN lower_limit < ${paramValue} ELSE ( CASE WHEN contain_lower = '1' THEN ${paramValue} <= upper_limit ELSE ${paramValue} < upper_limit END AND CASE WHEN contain_lower = '1' THEN ${paramValue} >= lower_limit ELSE ${paramValue} > lower_limit END ) END AND type_code = #{typeCode} ) l ON l.param = p.${joinParam} where p.display='1' and p.param=#{param} LIMIT 1

SELECT CASE m.display WHEN '1' THEN CASE m.${poColumn} WHEN '1' THEN IFNULL(l. LEVEL, '-') ELSE '-' END ELSE NULL END FROM wt_param p LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM wt_water_level WHERE param = #{param} AND CASE WHEN has_lower = '1' && has_upper = '0' THEN lower_limit < ${paramValue} ELSE ( CASE WHEN contain_lower = '1' THEN ${paramValue} <= upper_limit ELSE ${paramValue} < upper_limit END AND CASE WHEN contain_lower = '1' THEN ${paramValue} >= lower_limit ELSE ${paramValue} > lower_limit END ) END AND type_code = #{typeCode} ) l ON l.param = p.param LEFT JOIN ( select param,dibiao_display,heichou_display,display from wt_station_monitor where station_id=#{stationId} and param=#{param} ) m on m.param=p.param where m.display='1' and p.param=#{param}
SELECT CASE display WHEN '1' THEN '-' ELSE NULL END FROM ${table} p WHERE param=#{param}
SELECT CASE display WHEN '1' THEN '-' ELSE NULL END FROM wt_station_monitor WHERE param=#{param} AND station_id=#{stationId}
SELECT param_adjust from wt_station_monitor where station_id=#{id} and param=#{param}
select * from wt_water_level where param=#{param} and type_code=#{typeCode} and level_code=#{levelCode}
